text: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3 is a foldable smartphone that was released in 2021. == Features == === Display === The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3 has a display when folded and display when unfolded. === Cameras === The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3 has two rear cameras: 12 MP and 12 MP. === Photos === File:Galaxy Z Flip3 5G.jpg File:Galaxy Z Flip3.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3 5G.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3.jpg File:Galaxy Z Flip.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Flip.jpg == References == Z Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2021
